message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. I believe it would be a valuable asset to you.  To kick off our negotiation, I propose a starting price of $1,500,000.  I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While I understand your perspective on the value, the product holds significant potential and I've had considerable interest from other parties. To move this forward, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I think we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
